welcome_message: I'm a fullstack developer passionate about creating innovative web solutions
aboutMeText: My name is Jose Luiz Bruiani Barco and I have a {{age}} years. I am a full-stack developer with experience in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Python, creating responsive interfaces and functional applications. I am passionate about transforming ideas into practical and intuitive digital solutions. In addition to Portuguese, I also communicate in English, which allows me to collaborate on international projects and keep up with global technological trends
